Name: Cruiser-class WarShip
Details: The Cruiser-class WarShip was the military version of the earlier Conestoga-class JumpShip, both built by Boeing Interstellar for the Terran Hegemony, and equipped with a battery of naval autocannons and anti-ship missiles. By the time of the Star League the type was considered obsolete and the surviving examples had been decommissioned or placed into mothballs.
